text: What was the size of the interest rate cut announced by the FOMC at this meeting?
answers: A half percentage point (50 basis points)
A quarter percentage point (25 basis points)
Three-quarters of a percentage point (75 basis points)
A full percentage point (100 basis points)

text: What is the amount of shorter-term Treasury securities the Fed announced it would purchase in the first month?
What is the new target range for the federal funds rate following the rate cut decision?
What Star Wars character’s name was used to describe the large, two-sided market movement?
On which platform is the ongoing space-themed trading competition being held?
What were the two goals of the Federal Reserve’s dual mandate?
answers: GDP growth and low mortgage rates

text: According to the FOMC’s median projection, what was the total PCE inflation expected to be for the following year (2025)?
What was the stated purpose of the Federal Reserve’s decision to purchase shorter-term Treasury securities?
answers: To maintain an ample supply of reserves over time

text: In FOMC context, what is the “dot plot”?
answers: A visual of Fed balance sheet assets
A chart of each policymaker’s projected future policy rate
A graph of unemployment vs GDP

text: Which of the following are highlighted by the CoinWise Levels indicator?
answers: Opens, highs, lows, midpoints, VWAPs, and POCs

text: Jerome Powell stated that activity in which economic sector “remains weak”?
How many regularly scheduled FOMC meetings are typically held each year?
When the Fed says it will be “data-dependent,” what does that mean?
answers: It will follow the stock market index
It will act based on politics
It will adjust policy based on inflation & employment data

text: Which of the following is directly targeted by FOMC policy decisions?
